name: Garlic Builder
description:
"Garlic Builder" is a relaxing and casual pixel-building game. In the game, you play as the protagonist, Garlic, in a tranquil little mountain village. You collect various material blocks and create pixel crafts according to customer requests.

However, as the story unfolds, you discover that your building career is not as smooth as it seems. Commercial conspiracies from the city are encroaching on this small mountain village. But with your family by your side, there's nothing to fear.

Follow (or not follow?) blueprints to complete the build!

Use cubes to fulfill their bizarre requests before the specified date!

Understand the story behind the commissions.

Accept orders and collect feedback from customers to see how your construction has impacted their lives.

Using a variety of blocks.

Dozens of different blocks! Use them to freely build!
